Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28002968] The cell viability of RAW264.7 cells induced by WR1 is 99.44%, 96.62%, 95.21%, 94.08%, 92.96%, 92.99%, 92.68%, 87.04% and 77.58% at peptide concentrations of 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32 and 64 μM.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans
